name: Monster Club PC Demo
description:
Have you longed for a monster club video game, wanted a better way to play online, or want to try the game before buying?

MC PC Demo is THE best monster club demo, made by fans, for fans. Fight with friends across 4 worlds in the monster club universe. Customize with 320 character possibilities and 4 premade, and balanced decks! Fully online multiplayer monster club, for free!

MC PC Demo is available now on Mac and Windows!

Join the Monster Club community: https://discord.gg/xDh8ABA

Stay up to date with MC PC news and other THBA projects: https://discord.gg/BU9bCPTVtm
